reviews.text: Would be great to have fast / semi fast trains to Stratford or Liverpool St.

A very good train station that is quite consistent and rarely has delays.They even have a small coffee shop and a tiny newsagents.A very good train station overall although there is room for improvement in some places,one being the cleanliness of the trains although they are tolerable.An all round decent train station certainly deserving of the very respectable four star rating.

TFL station, with four platforms, platforms two and three are an island platform with a stairway and lift for access, currently there are toilets for both male and female, and waiting rooms with heating. There is easy access for taxi transport from platform four, and bus services via the Kings Road entrance/exit at street level, There is a cafe on the middle platform, plus a newsagent  which is accessible on the footbridge over platform one.
Good station would be made 50% better if the fast train stoped here too. Cab rank just outside. Shop in the station.
